tasks.label: Compile and Run
args: if [[ "$OSTYPE" == "msys" ]]; then g++ ${file} -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension} && ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe < .\input.txt > output.txt && del ${fileBasenameNoExtension}.exe; else g++ ${file} -o ${fileBasenameNoExtension} && ./${fileBasenameNoExtension} < ./input.txt > output.txt; fi
